评论概述: Cheap quality but overall good for the price
评论详情: The material for the belt is very obviously cheap and the metal grommet that the chain was hooked on came out after the first wear. Don't get me wrong they're very easy to put back in but it's a little annoying. The prongs on the belt are also very thin and cheaply made and this makes them a bit sharp and easy to scrape yourself on. All this aside it's not a bad belt for the price and I'm still going to wear it for as long as I can before it breaks in a way that I can't fix.

评论概述: A little cheaply made, but well worth it
评论详情: I bought these to go with an outfit, and they work great. The material of the belt is nice and flexible, which makes it easier to clip chains to the belt. The buckle, however, is a little bit sharp on the ends, and the metal is somewhat thin. It is definitely cheaply made, but still durable. As long as you're careful, it really isn't an issue. The chains that came with the belts are a bit difficult to clip on due to how they are made, but the chains themselves are nice. If you're looking for fairly affordable yet durable belts, these are the ones to get for sure, as they hold up quite nicely despite their flaws.
